title: Strengthening HR management practical competencies: Constructivist-based nursing clinical education design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze six key influencing factors (interpersonal, sociocultural, educational, environmental, emotional, physical) through clinical scenario simulations

Learners can interact with peers and instructors at least three times per week via online collaboration tools like Slack or Microsoft Teams over one week and write feedback explaining judgment rationales with 80% accuracy for five provided clinical case scenarios.
Learners can document cases experienced during clinical practice through reflective journaling and derive improvement strategies using self-assessment tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
